Job Posting: 177392 - Position: S26 Student - Operations Data Analyst Intern - Summer 2026 177392 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/26/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/20/2026 11:36 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country MDA Corporation 13800 Commerce Parkway Richmond V6V 2J3 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Description 2026 - Summer S26 Student - Operations Data Analyst Intern - Summer 2026 177392 Co-op Position Brampton, ON Canada 12 or 16 months Hybrid CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $23 - $26 hourly. Building the space between proven and possible, MDA Space (TSX:MDA) is a trusted mission partner to the global space industry. A robotics, satellite systems and geointelligence pioneer with a 55-year+ story of world firsts and more than 450 missions, MDA Space is a global leader in communications satellites, Earth and space observation, and space exploration and infrastructure. The MDA Space team of more than 3,800 space experts in Canada, the US and the UK has the knowledge and know-how to turn an audacious customer vision into an achievable mission - bringing to bear a one-of-a-kind mix of experience, engineering excellence and wide-eyed wonder that's been in our DNA since day one. For those who dream big and push boundaries on the ground and in the stars to change the world for the better, we'll take you there. We are excited to announce that we are seeking a passionate and talented Business or Computer Science Student to join the Operational Excellence team at our Brampton facility. This position is a 12-to-16-month internship beginning in May 2026. As a member of our Operational Excellence team, you will play a role in developing, maintaining, and enhancing reporting tools and products to optimize business operations and promote data-driven decision making across the organization. Based in our Brampton office, you will have the chance to make a meaningful impact and gain valuable experience in a dynamic and supportive environment. Job Duties and Responsibilities As part of this role, you will: • Work with our IT department to perform data ingestion into the data lake • Execute operational assignments related to corporate strategy, governance, risk management, strategic operations, etc. • Perform a variety of tasks to collect and analyze current process information and metrics • Research industry best practices related to business tool, process and data governance and contribute to the development of future state plans • Review and process incoming analytics and dashboard requests • Update dashboards to point to the lake prior to publishing • Support and maintain published dashboards Job Requirements Job Requirements: • Currently pursuing post-secondary education as a computer science and/or business student (minimum three years completed preferred) • Intermediate to advanced skills in Microsoft Excel • Experience with statistical analysis • Excellent organizational skills • Excellent prioritization and time management skills • Intermediate to advanced knowledge of SQL Enthusiasm and willingness to learn • Assets: • Experience creating or designing visuals in Power BI • Data ingestion experience • Familiarity with business processes • Data modelling experience Prior experience in a manufacturing/engineering field • Comments/Special Considerations: Successful candidates must obtain and hold security clearance at the reliability status level, and pass security assessment for the Controlled Goods Program (CGP). Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Student - Operations Data Analyst Intern - Summer 2026 | MDA Space Canada Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
